name: @kaelmo/capacitor-camera-layers
description: Capacitor plugin for camera preview with customizable layers that composite onto captured photos
author: kaelmo

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: cd ios && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace Plugin.xcworkspace -scheme Plugin -destination generic/platform=iOS
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js
